verses.roman:
duṅhāra mukhe nirantara kṛṣṇa-nāma śuni'
bhaṭṭa kahe, prabhura kichu iṅgita-bhaṅgī jāni'

synonyms: duṅhāra mukhe—in the mouths of both Rūpa Gosvāmī and his brother Vallabha; nirantara—continuously; kṛṣṇa-nāma śuni'-hearing the chanting of the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; bhaṭṭa kahe—Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya said; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kichu—some; iṅgita—indications; bhaṅgī—hints; jāni'-understanding.
translation: Hearing the holy name constantly vibrated by the two brothers, Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya could understand the hints of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
